title: Nearly five hours island wide power cut today
content: Due to the lack of fuel for power plants power cuts will be experienced island wide for nearly five hours today.The Public Utilities Commission stated that the CEB made a request for this The power outage will start at 8.30 am and will operate in zones till 10.30 pm.For the entire schedule of the power cutsyesterday. Accordingly, power cuts will be imposed in A, B and C zones for 04 hours and 40 minutes and in other zones for 04 hours and 30 minutes.
